titles: The noble-mans patterne of true and reall thankfulnesse presented in a sermon preached before the Right Honourable House of Lords, at their late solemne day of Thanksgiving, June 15, 1643 : for the discovery of a dangerous, desperate and bloody designe tending to the utter subversion of the Parliament and of the famous city of London / by Edmund Calamy ...
author: Calamy, Edmund, 1600-1666.
publisher: Printed by G.M. for Christopher Meredith ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
